data.name: Caapora Adventure - Ojibe's Revenge
data.detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1375760/Tropicalia/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564450/The_Gorcs_Forge/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2023810/Island_Idle_RPG/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1654860/Luffy_Way_Back_Home/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807540/Cat_Swap_Tiles/


About the Game



The Caapora stone that has been protected for years by elemental guardians was broken up by a renegade Shaman called Ojibe and was fragmented into four parts that were spread throughout the continent of Zaltana, now chaos and darkness has once again hovered over the human world.

Caapora Adventure: Ojibe's Revenge combines a great storytelling, unique cartoon 3D visuals and exciting gameplay into one epic action-adventure experience. In the game you explore the continent of Zaltana, a world filled with many dangers, puzzles and secrets. You must fight creatures inspired by Brazilian’s Folklore, learn to use native weapons and discover ancient treasures, which will help you on your quest. Use all of your wits and skill to unravel the mysteries of the Zaltana continent.

Solve Puzzles

Defeat many creatures

Craft many items


---------------------------------------------------------------------
OVERVIEW:

  • A beautiful world to explore inspired by amazon rainforest
  • Defeat creature and entities inspired by Myths and Legends from Brazilian Folklore
  • Release new places by using new behaviours (Swimming, Exploding Bomb, Metroidvania-like gameplay)
  • Use weapons such as: Bow, Magical bombs, Spear, Zarabatana, Crafted Shields
  • Many Puzzles to solve in Dungeons
  • Original Characters
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Epic Story


Defeat Epic Bosses inspired by Brazilian Folklore



Solve many puzzles in dungeons



Explore and discover hidden places



Craft New Items to Progress



Find Unique Characters



To request features, enhancements or comunicate issues join us on our discord channel

data.short_description: Explore a beautiful world inspired by Amazon rainforest with many secrets, puzzles and creatures from myths and legends from Brazilian Folklore
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“I loved the theme of this game about the Amazon and Brazilian folklore!”
Steam Reviewer

“Liked it! A game with a different theme! Really fun!”
Steam Reviewer

“Nice and colorful adventure game! You can see that the developer took inspiration from Zelda, particularly Wind Waker, and transported to the theme of the Amazon Forest.”
Steam Reviewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.0
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5850 or NVidia GeForce GTX 460, and 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11.5
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5850 or NVidia GeForce GTX 460, and 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.
